ScreenFimDoJogo.descricao1: You made a bad choice player!
ScreenFimDoJogo.descricao2: Care in the streets should be the same for scooters.

ScreenCreditos.agradecimento: Thank you so much for playing! :)

patineteDesbloqueado.texto1: Give three pushes and press the throttle
patineteDesbloqueado.texto2: Give one push and press the throttle

parouParaPedestrePassarContinuaParaIrEst.texto1: Park the scooter on top of the tree
parouParaPedestrePassarContinuaParaIrEst.texto2: Park the scooter beside the tree
